org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.trace.archive2

Interface TraceArchiveWriter.TraceArchiveRecordCallback

  • Enclosing class:
    TraceArchiveWriter

    public static interface TraceArchiveWriter.TraceArchiveRecordCallback
    TraceArchiveRecordCallback is a way to add additional metadata to specific TraceArchiveRecords before they are built. The TraceArchiveWriter will create an instance of TraceArchiveRecordBuilder for each record but only partially populate them. It is up to implementations of TraceArchiveWriter.TraceArchiveRecordCallback to complete building each record by setting attribute key value pairs that a generic TraceArchiveWriter won't know how to set. For example, each trace often requires primer information to be set in a trace archive. Implementations of TraceArchiveWriter.TraceArchiveRecordCallback would know how to look up such information from the clients LIMS system.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMetaData(String traceName, File traceFile, TraceArchiveRecordBuilder builder)
      Add any additional metadata to the given TraceArchiveRecordBuilder for the given traceName with the accompanying traceFile.

    • Method Detail

      • addMetaData

        void addMetaData(String traceName,
                 File traceFile,
                 TraceArchiveRecordBuilder builder)
          throws TraceArchiveWriter.TraceArchiveRecordDataException
        Add any additional metadata to the given TraceArchiveRecordBuilder for the given traceName with the accompanying traceFile. The given builder already has several attributes already including:
        • TraceInfoField.TRACE_NAME = traceName
        • TraceInfoField.TRACE_FILE = path to a copy of traceFile
        • TraceInfoField.BASE_FILE = path to nucleotide sequence fasta
        • TraceInfoField.PEAK_FILE = path to peak positions sequence fasta
        • TraceInfoField.QUAL_FILE = path to quality sequence fasta
        Additional metadata that is recommended to be added are attributes such as direction, primer and vector info etc.
        Parameters:
        traceName - the name that is used to set the TraceInfoField.TRACE_NAME.
        traceFile - the actual trace file of this record. A copy of this file is included in the archive and pointed to by TraceInfoField.TRACE_FILE.
        builder - the builder to add extra metadata to such as direction, primer and vector info etc.
        Throws:
        TraceArchiveWriter.TraceArchiveRecordDataException
